reviews.text: Received warm welcome walking through the door. Very friendly and helpful staff. Facilities recently renovated and cozy feel. Best hot breakfast, with great selection, I've had at hotel in a very long time. well priced for the location. Pool was exceptionally clean. Exercise equipment in good repair. I really enjoyed my stay and will stay again if I pass this way. I would recommend this to my friends.
reviews.title: Great experience

reviews.text: My husband and I decided to stay here while attending a wedding for a weekend. I normally do not like Best Westerns but this one was actually clean and comfortable. I could not ask for more from a hotel.
reviews.title: Comfortable Stay

reviews.text: I don't really write reviews but I had such an easy/relaxed time at this BW, that and the entire staff was extremely helpful and kind to my entire family. We had a group of 6 on our trip and with everyone's individual needs, the patience and thoughtfulness of the staff was noteworthy.
reviews.title: Really enjoyed our stay

reviews.text: The rooms we had were also very nice and relaxing, the beds were great and everything was clean. I would stay here again and will actually miss this and our trip to Indiana!! Its such a nice place with nice people.
reviews.title: Great Stay!!!

reviews.text: Very comfortable and had everything you would need for a very enjoyable stay. The staff were unbelievably helpful from the ladies who cleaned our room, to the gentlemen in front desk. If we get the opportunity to go back we will be staying there again.
reviews.title: Nice and clean hotel, with helpful staff

reviews.text: Close to interstate, outlet mall and Columbus, IN. Motels in the area are pricey, and the taxes are really high. Room was nice, but the high pressure toilet didn't work correctly and it never did get to work right. Breakfast OK, but the breakfast room way too small. Desk staff very nice.
reviews.title: Convenient and good enough

reviews.text: In all fairness here were the pros: allowed our dog for a $10 fee, relatively inexpensive, free breakfast, good location. The staff was friendly, though there were so many issues with the hotel itself it would have been pointless to request remedy.
reviews.title: Worst hotel in 4000 miles...

reviews.text: Here were the cons that outweighed the pros for us:
reviews.title: Awesome spot to stop

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Paint chips in the bathtub
reviews.title: Dirty Room

reviews.text: Room (in a non smoking hotel) reeked of cigarettes and musk
reviews.title: Would not give money back for cancellation the night before.

reviews.text: No matter what shift the front desk was very helpful. Jen and Rick provided excellent service. Rooms were clean and the hotel was nice. Staff gave out directions to area attractions. Courteous and professional staff. Cleaning personnel were also great. I recommend this hotel whether on business or pleasure.
reviews.title: Great service awesome staff

reviews.text: Clean rooms and friendly staff, we in town to start the 2013 Miracle Ride from a different location this year and started at Mann’s Harley instead of up north. We were satisfied with the accommodations for a reasonable price and would definitely repeat next time we are in the area. The only issue was the temperature of the pool. Planned to take a quick dip but it was just too cold to dip in past my calves. No wonder the pool area was empty.
reviews.title: Clean rooms-friendly staff

reviews.text: I stayed here while attending the NCAA tournament. The room was very clean, the staff was very courteous and the breakfast was great. The staff was nice about giving me directions and telling me about things I asked about. I would definitely recommend this motel to anyone. Also, it was very quiet.
reviews.title: NCAA Trip

reviews.text: We had to attend a function in the area and landed in the Best Western. The hotel was very, very clean without the strong cleaning product smell that some hotels have The staff was exceedingly courteous, offering assistance at every point. The breakfast buffet was delicious with a nice assortment of items. AND it was affordable.
reviews.title: Affordable, clean, courteaous

reviews.text: We stayed here for a horse show at the Hoosier Horse Park and were pleasantly surprised! The room was a nice size and well decorated. The rooms all have a dorm size frig, a microwave, and coffee maker in them. The breakfast had a good variety of hot and cold items. My son said the biscuits and gravy were "awesome"! The hotel was right across the street from the Premium Outlet mall so if you needed a place to stay while you shopped, this would be a great choice.
reviews.title: Nice, clean hotel

reviews.text: Wow! What a pleasant surprise! Where else may you can get great service, great facility, great location for such a low price. All that with a real hot breakfast and an indoor pool oasis that was hust as warm. We WILL return!
reviews.title: You'll regret staying somewhere else in the area!

reviews.text: Came over to spend the night (and for wife and daughter to shop at Edinburgh outlet stores) after spending a day at neighboring Bloomington, IN for my daughter's IU red carpet days. Hotel was clean, looked recently renovated, with modern design touches. Morning hot breakfast was decent, friendly and accommodating staff. They allowed us late checkout as my other 2 younger kids wanted to get in the pool in the morning of checkout day. Hotel is across the street from outlet stores. It was a very relaxing and peaceful stay.
reviews.title: Worth it, great location, friendly staff

reviews.text: Jenny was the receptionist who helped with our checking in. She gave us a great rate on three night stay. She was very helpful ,friendly,and went above and beyond her job requirements to make sure we were comfortable and happy with everything !!!! Our rooms where excellent, very clean, and the bed were very comfortable. The breakfast in the morning were excellent and very good. It is a excellent place to stay. Tell Jenny that Scruffy said so LOL. I ate at the cracker barrel and the food was awesome and it was only across the street. To sum it up go see Jenny and she will treat you with respect and a big ole smile. It is a GREAT place to rest and stay.
reviews.title: great place to stay

reviews.text: We travel from KY to MI to see family several times a year. This hotel is about halfway for us. It is clean, surroundings are pleasant, staff is friendly and considerate, breakfast is better than most places we've stayed, beds are comfortable and we will definitely continue to stop here on our back-and-forth trips!
reviews.title: A Great Night's Rest

reviews.text: Right off the expressway ( It is a 4 hour drive so I love getting off and it is right there), Right next to the Outlet Mall (Shopping Mecca for wife)
reviews.title: Location, Location, Location
